CustomField.description: This field holds the Monthly Total Price.
CustomField.formula: if(Text(ProdType__c) == "ILF" || Text(ProdType__c) == "ILSF" || Text(ProdType__c) == "HOSF" || Text(ProdType__c) == "ILHF" || Text(ProdType__c) == "DVC1" || Text(ProdType__c) == "DVF2" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVFF" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVFT" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVFP" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVTM" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVPT" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SVTT" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SPFP" || Text(ProdType__c) == "SPTM" || Text(ProdType__c) == "HWR" ,SBQQ__RegularTotal__c /(SBQQ__DefaultSubscriptionTerm__c*SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c),0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field holds the Monthly Total Price.
CustomField.label: Monthly Total Price
